connect20/inic_creditpayment.name: connect20/Inic_Creditpayment

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/inic_creditpayment.description:
Admin can assign credits which are then redeemable at time of purchase towards the cost of your order. 
Credit points are an added bonus to our customers on the site and just one of the ways we thank you for being a loyal customer.
